name: Shuffled world
description:
It's still in beta, but I'll keep working on this one.

game.

(control)

as usual (W,S,D,A)

(talk to NPS)

click on it with the mouse (not at all)

(gameplay)

you get into the portal, and you are thrown into a mixed world, your task is to talk with the locals and collect the fragments of the portal.

(since this is a beta, there is still not much space there, but I will fix it as soon as I get at least some kind of audience.

and I apologize in advance if you don’t have a main menu, I’ll fix that too.)
